definition: to be dispersed/to break down/to fester/to ulcerate

sentences.english: Corneal ulcers occur most often in patients who use extended-wear soft contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 角膜溃疡最常发生于长期使用软性角膜接触镜的病人。

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical treatment in massive hemorrhage of gastroduodenal ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胃十二指肠溃疡大出血的外科治疗。

sentences.english: Gastritis may cause symptoms resembling those of peptic ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 胃炎可引起类似消化性溃疡的症状。

sentences.english: Tamitha, who had diabetes and ulcers, began to tremble.
sentences.chinese: 患有糖尿病和溃疡的塔米莎不禁冷得开始打颤。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effect of deep lamellar keratoplasty for corneal ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨深板层角膜移植术治疗角膜溃疡的临床效果。

sentences.english: Objective To study the antiulcer activities of almagate.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究铝镁加分散片的抗溃疡作用。

sentences.english: The same applies to pressure ulcers, says Edwards.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华兹说这同样适用于压力溃疡。

sentences.english: Historically, Vanilla was used to treat impotency, ulcers, hysteria and rashes.
sentences.chinese: 历史上，香草用于治疗阳痿，溃疡，歇斯底里和皮疹。

sentences.english: RANTES expression in venous ulceration of lower limbs;
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨下肢静脉性溃疡的治疗。

sentences.english: Lidocaine is also prescribed for people with very sore throats and those with canker sores in the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 利多卡因也用于喉咙痛和口腔溃疡患者。

sentences.english: Ulcer edge appears to" roll over" into the defect and is a tough fibrinous ring.
sentences.chinese: 溃疡边缘“翻卷”进入凹陷处，形成一坚硬的纤维环。

sentences.english: Does Helicobacter pylori eradication therapy for peptic ulcer prevent gastric cancer?
sentences.chinese: 幽门螺杆菌根除治疗消化性溃疡是否能预防胃癌？

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of the treatment using privet trees fresh leaves on canker in mouth.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较常规治疗与女贞子鲜叶治疗口腔溃疡的疗效。

sentences.english: So why did a 24 year old develop an ulcer?
sentences.chinese: 那么一个24岁的人为什么会患溃疡呢？

sentences.english: Health professionals also employ a fluorescein stain to detect ulcers of the cornea.
sentences.chinese: 卫生专业人员还采用了荧光染色检测的角膜溃疡。

sentences.english: Gargle baking soda water to help with ulcers.
sentences.chinese: 用小苏打水来漱口可以预防溃疡。

definition: stomatitis/ulceration of oral cavity/inflammation of the mucous lining of the mouth
